item.title: 3-Minute Infographic - Boost Productivity with ChatGPT + Mermaid
item.author: programmur.tw@gmail.com (androchentw)
item.description:
Overview

3-Minute Infographic - Boost Productivity with ChatGPT + Mermaid

Today I’d like to share the diagramming tools I use in practice and how I combine them, hoping to help friends who love using visualization to illustrate their logic.

Actually, diagram-as-code tools have been around for a while; it’s just that ChatGPT makes this task even easier.

Features of today’s introduced tool:

  1. üåê Free to use on a web page.
  2. üöÄ Quickly generate flowcharts, mindmaps, pie charts, Gantt charts, timelines, user journeys, and more.
  3. üìù Uses markdown syntax, easy to learn even without an engineering background, convenient for version control.

ü§î Q: What kind of charts would you typically use ChatGPT + Mermaid to assist you with in your daily work?

üí™ A: Choose an example and actually draw a chart using the online editor.

item.title: Auto-GPT & AgentGPT: Unleashing the Magic of AI-driven Task Completion - Get Started
item.author: programmur.tw@gmail.com (androchentw)
item.description:
Overview

Auto-GPT / AgentGPT Autonomous AI Mechanism

Around 4 months after the release of ChatGPT, the Auto-GPT and AgentGPT frameworks for AI-assisted task completion were introduced.

This means that by providing a “Goal,” it can automatically complete the task through an iterative process of breaking down the task, implementing, and verifying.

The key to making Auto-GPT so powerful lies in:

  1. üß† Utilizing LLM to understand requirements and initiate tasks
  2. üåê Access to the internet for real-time updates
  3. üíæ Support for long-term memory storage, overcoming ChatGPT token limits

Today, I will share some observations and let’s discuss in 4 areas:

  1. üî• Demonstration
  2. ‚ò†Ô∏è Warning: üí∞ Budget control
  3. üëÄ Importance of requirements/review/stage evaluation
  4. üöÄ Leverage Agile/Lean Startup “MVP” concept to build your own rocket

ü§î Q: To what extent can Auto-GPT achieve?

üí™ A: Consider what you would use AI for, its effectiveness, and potential for further development.

(2023/04/16) I’m an IT engineer from Taiwan üáπüáº. I’m using ChatGPT and other software to help translate the original and future valuable articles. If there are any unclear expressions, please feel free to let me know. I’m also working hard to learn English and Japanese!

item.title: ProgramMur - Programmer's Murmur Redefine + Newsletter
item.author: programmur.tw@gmail.com (androchentw)
item.description:
Kyoto K≈çdai-ji Temple, Hideyoshi Toyotomi, Goshuincho Dream Yume

2023-04-04 A thousand expectations I originally wanted to release on April Fool’s Day.

Recently, thanks to ChatGPT, I have made many new friends. I am very grateful for the attention and hope that I can continue to present insightful knowledge points to you. In summary, I will define the positioning of this blog, the content I expect to cover, and try to launch a free newsletter. If you have any feedback or ideas, please feel free to send a private message or email. Let’s grow together and explore the journey of technology/life.

ü§î Q: What knowledge do you want to gain?

üí™ A: Subscribe to the newsletter!

item.author: programmur.tw@gmail.com (androchentw)
item.description: ChatGPT Language Learning: 6 Tips for Utilizing YouTube + Free Plugins to Improve TOEIC Score Overview I have been actively using ChatGPT to self-study English and Japanese recently. Features of the tools introduced today: üåê Free to use online. üöÄ Generate bilingual subtitles and video summary Mindmap on YouTube with one click and convert them into TOEIC test questions. üìù Combine ChatGPT translation and modification features to create your vocabulary book and essay collection.
